questions.question: Which of the following is a characteristic of algae?
options: They have cell walls made of chitin

questions.question: Algae are primarily found in which environment?
Which of the following is NOT a major group of algae?
What pigment is characteristic of green algae?
Which algae group is most closely related to land plants?
What is the main storage compound in most algae?
Which of the following is an economic importance of algae?
options: Source of food and food additives

questions.question: What is eutrophication?
options: A process that removes algae from water bodies
Excessive growth of algae due to nutrient pollution
The evolution of algae into land plants
